text: Denis Sonet (1926 - 23 September 2015) was a French Catholic priest, chaplain, marriage counselor, and educator. He worked for the CLER Amour et Famille from 1969 until his death. He also wrote over thirty books and appeared in around five DVDs. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2015 deaths Category:French educators Category:French Roman Catholic priests Category:French writers Category:20th-century writers
title: Denis Sonet
